title: [Minecraft.net | MINECRAFT BUILDS] 故事之桥
author: FaceTime
txt_content:
本帖最后由 FaceTime 于 2020-6-12 19:38 编辑 

MINECRAFT BUILDSStorybook Bridge
故事之桥

Submitted by InventBoss
作品由InventBoss投稿Jess Robinson


Passage from desert to grasslands has never been quite as charming as this quirky bridge by InventBoss . With cobblestone steps and dark prismarine roof, this build looks like something straight out of a story book.
从荒无人烟的沙漠一路走到苍翠欲滴的草原，我敢保证你从未见过有InventBoss建造的桥更如此迷人的建筑。有着圆石台阶和暗海晶石屋顶的装饰，这项建筑看起来就像是直接从故事书里直接走出来似的。
Want to share your own works? Drop us a note along with a screenshot to FeatureMe@minecraft.net and you might find your work here.

你也想分享你的作品？请给我们留言并把你的照片发送至FeatureMe@minecraft.net，然后你或许能在这看见你的大作。




【你 译自官网 2020 年 06 月 11 日发布的 Storybook Bridge；原作者 Jess Robinson】
【本文排版借助了：SPX】

replies.author: FaceTime
replies.txt_content: 这栏目有够惨的，建筑看着有够寒酸

replies.author: :spgbigfan:
replies.txt_content: 投稿到FeatureMe@minecraft.net的基本上都是这么短，真想接受采访还得投scoops@minecraft.com
